How to Deploy a Website with Wordpress

May 11, 2016

Hey Guys!

Today I have a video up for you to show you how to setup a website. There are two methods I briefly demonstrate in the video â€” WordPress and File Upload. If you just want to get a quick site or blog up and running then WordPress is the way to go. If you have a folder on your computer with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript files then use the File Upload feature to get those files loaded onto the server. Check out the video below and put this info to use in your next site!
